amendment.description: To require guidelines on the use of tiered evaluations for offers for contracts and task orders under contracts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2459 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2459 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12508) To require guidelines on the use of tiered evaluations for offers for contracts and task orders under contracts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2459 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2459 proposed by Senator Warner.
